author: Staff Reporter
text:
A portion of Poonamallee High Road caved in near Evening Bazaar Road intersection opposite Government Rajiv Gandhi Hospital on Thursday night. The huge crater on the road forced traffic police to cordon off the portion and divert traffic.

Traffic police officials said the incident took place around 9 p.m. when vehicular movement was light. The spot was barricaded and vehicles were diverted through the narrow South Mint Street and Evening Bazaar Road.

The official said the caved in portion was at least 6-7 feet deep. They informed officials of Chennai Metro Rail Limited (CMRL) who dumped concrete-mix at the spot about an hour later.
title: P. H. Road caves in yet again
